body: Yes it is free forever. Use free tier for testing and development, limited to 50 submissions/mo
We offer 3 different premium packages organized around different levels of needs. You can select the one that fits your needs and by using your credit card you can start your premium subscription.

header: How do you store my credit card information?
body: We use Stripe as our payment processing partner to securely store your card, easily and securely enable payment features in our services .
Dropform is flexible. You can easily cancel your account online in two clicks. There are no cancellation fees â€“ start or stop your account at any time.

header: What if I exceed the monthly submission limit?
body: Don't worry! We will save them in a secure place until the first day of next month, but you can't see them unless you upgrade your plan. By upgrading your plan you can recover those submissions!
